short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sounds and notifications for Idle Quest RPG

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sound alerts and desktop notifications for:
- Autos remaining
- Bosses
- Events and bonuses
- Raid returns
- Clan events

Click on the extension icon to open the settings page. Refresh IQ after installing.
You have to allow desktop notifications on iqrpg.com in order for them to work (click on "allow" if prompted).
